Package kboyle.oktane.core

Class CommandHandler.Builder<T extends CommandContext>

java.lang.Object
kboyle.oktane.core.CommandHandler.Builder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of context that's used in commands.
Enclosing class:
CommandHandler<T extends CommandContext>
public static class CommandHandler.Builder<T extends CommandContext> extends Object
A builder for the CommandHandler.
